short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple tool that helps users track and monitor their TRUE (taxed) earnings on RustyPot

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple tool that helps users track and monitor their TRUE (taxed) earnings on RustyPot. A true profit calculation is automatically added to your user summary on-site. This is ~95%-99% accurate.
